text: Timiharumathi dharmayud'dha garnu anivarya gari'eko cha, tyo timila'i kathina lagna sakcha. Sambhava cha timila'i kunai kura naramro lagos tara vastavama timro lagi tyo hitakara hunecha, ra yo pani sambhava cha ki timile kunai kurala'i ramro samjha tara timro nimti tyo hanikaraka hunecha. (Yi kuraharuko) vastavikatako janakari allahala'i cha timiharu bujhdainau
